stochastic_function: lambda study_decision: {1:0.7,0:0.3,-1:0.0} if study_decision == 'study more' else {1:0.3,0:0.5,-1:0.2}
lambda study_decision: {1:0.7,0:0.2,-1:0.1} if study_decision == 'study less' else {1:0.45,0:0.45,-1:0.1}

lambda current_knowledge, health_status, exam_difficulty: {1:0.7,0:0.2,-1:0.1} if current_knowledge==1 and health_status==1 and exam_difficulty==-1 else {1:0.6,0:0.3,-1:0.1} if current_knowledge==1 and health_status==1 and exam_difficulty==0 else {1:0.5,0:0.4,-1:0.1} if current_knowledge==1 and health_status==1 and exam_difficulty==1 else {1:0.6,0:0.3,-1:0.1} if current_knowledge==1 and health_status==0 and exam_difficulty==-1 else {1:0.5,0:0.4,-1:0.1} if current_knowledge==1 and health_status==0 and exam_difficulty==0 else {1:0.4,0:0.5,-1:0.1} if current_knowledge==1 and health_status==0 and exam_difficulty==1 else {1:0.5,0:0.4,-1:0.1} if current_knowledge==1 and health_status==-1 and exam_difficulty==-1 else {1:0.4,0:0.5,-1:0.1} if current_knowledge==1 and health_status==-1 and exam_difficulty==0 else {1:0.3,0:0.6,-1:0.1} if current_knowledge==1 and health_status==-1 and exam_difficulty==1 else {1:0.6,0:0.3,-1:0.1} if current_knowledge==0 and health_status==1 and exam_difficulty==-1 else {1:0.5,0:0.4,-1:0.1} if current_knowledge==0 and health_status==1 and exam_difficulty==0 else {1:0.4,0:0.5,-1:0.1} if current_knowledge==0 and health_status==1 and exam_difficulty==1 else {1:0.5,0:0.4,-1:0.1} if current_knowledge==0 and health_status==0 and exam_difficulty==-1 else {1:0.4,0:0.5,-1:0.1} if current_knowledge==0 and health_status==0 and exam_difficulty==0 else {1:0.3,0:0.6,-1:0.1} if current_knowledge==0 and health_status==0 and exam_difficulty==1 else {1:0.4,0:0.5,-1:0.1} if current_knowledge==0 and health_status==-1 and exam_difficulty==-1 else {1:0.3,0:0.6,-1:0.1} if current_knowledge==0 and health_status==-1 and exam_difficulty==0 else {1:0.2,0:0.7,-1:0.1} if current_knowledge==0 and
